## Data

The table on this pages shows data that is published following our R data package workflow. Each data set comes with its own website and rich documentation to increase reusability. 


::: {.cell}

:::


:::{.column-page}

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
| id|name                   |status     |description                                                                                                                                                                |published      |website                                             |
|--:|:----------------------|:----------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:--------------|:---------------------------------------------------|
|  1|wasteskipsblantyre     |published  |Data on locations of the publicly accessible waste skips in Blantyre, Malawi collected in 2021.                                                                            |02. August 2023|<https://openwashdata.github.io/wasteskipsblantyre/>|
|  2|fsmglobal              |published  |Populations of 175 countries requiring different faecal sludge emptying services.                                                                                          |02. August 2023|<https://openwashdata.github.io/fsmglobal/>         |
|  3|cbssuitabilityhaiti    |[in-progress](<https://github.com/openwashdata/cbssuitabilityhaiti>)|Spatial data to support an analysis of suitability of container-based sanitation in flood prone areas of Haiti.                                                            |               |                                                    |
|  4|dryingfaecal           |[in-progress](<https://github.com/openwashdata/dryingfaecal>)|Engineering experiments related to drying of faecal sludge from on-site sanitation facilities and fresh faeces.                                                            |               |                                                    |
|  5|climatevulnerabilitykhm|[in-progress](<https://github.com/openwashdata/climatevulnerabilitykhm>)|Data on Effects of Climate Vulnerability on Sanitation Access, Sanitation Infrastructure Functionality and Householdsâ€™ Fecal Sludge Management Practices in Rural Cambodia.|               |                                                    |
